text: UAllâh ngenene Wasizalisekisa isithembiso saKhe kuni xa nina nanibabulala ngemvume yaKhe; nada naphelelwa kukuzithemba, nawa kwimpikiswano ngomyalelo, anathobela, Esakuba Enibonise ixhayelo enilithanda kunene. Phakathi kwenu kukho abo banqwenela (izinto) zeli hlabathi kubekho abo banqwenela uBomi oBuzayo. Ke yena Wanenza nabaleka nemka kubo, ukuze Anicikide. Kodwa inene Wanixolela Yena, kwaye uAllâh Unofefe kwabo bakholwayo
